General.Name: Luster Industries Bhd
General.Description: Luster Industries Bhd, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells precision plastic parts and components in Malaysia, the Asia-Pacific, the United Kingdom, Germany, Italy, New Zealand, South Africa, Saudi Arabia, Chile, Kenya, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Manufacturing, Construction and Property Development, Glove Manufacturing and EPCC Contract, Gaming and Leisure, and Other segments. The company is also involved in the sub-assembly of plastic parts and products; manufacture of die-casting components; manufacture, sale, and distribution of latex examination gloves; and property construction and development activities. In addition, it undertakes precision engineering works; operates as an original equipment manufacturer for hygiene and pests control products, as well as lotteries; and provides glove related system, technology, supply chain, and operations services. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Sungai Petani, Malaysia.
